string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: Throw it into a blue container. You can also dispose of paper there, but put your used up milk cartons in the yellow one instead!
Throw it into a green container. Remember that the bottles should be emptied before disposing of them!
Throw it into a yellow container, together with all the plastic you can find!
Throw it into a blue container, along with your newspapers, notebooks and paperbags - but put wet paper in the black one instead!
Throw it into a yellow container. You\'re doing a great and important job disposing of plastic the right way!
Throw it into a black container. Remember - meat and used diapers go here as well!

resources.string: Hover your camera over the waste!
What you sent is most likely…
